name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Christopher LEDDINGTON, Appellee

judges: Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Christopher LEDDINGTON, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 23rd day of March, 2004, the order of the Bucks County Court of Common Pleas is reversed insofar as it declared the Registration of Sexual Offenders Act unconstitutional, and the case is remanded for further proceedings. See Commonwealth v. Williams, 574 Pa. 487, 832 A.2d 962 (2003); Commonwealth v. Maldonado, 576 Pa. 101, 838 A.2d 710 (2003).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Daniel Martin Keane, for Com., of Pennsylvania.
Christa S. Dunleavy, for Christopher Leddington.
casebody.head_matter:
845 A.2d 777
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellant, v. Christopher LEDDINGTON, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Nov. 10, 2003.
Decided March 23, 2004.
Daniel Martin Keane, for Com., of Pennsylvania.
Christa S. Dunleavy, for Christopher Leddington.
Before CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
